item.title: Interactive Structure Models
item.description: See the Pen Interactive Building Integrity Reporting Map by Greg Willson (@biomassives) on CodePen.[/codepen_embed] Mobile technology has provided a platform to help visualize structural integrity of buildings.. Crowdmap provides a simple free solution of hosted map reporting portal for people to make use of as needed. Visit https://crowdmap.com to get started. By making use of free interface code available at https://codepen.io specialized interfaces can be created to help address specific Sustainable Community Development issues.
